body_html: You'd have to implement the change in math_ops.py _SelectShape to allow the new shape signature, math_ops.cc's ShapeFn to do the same, and then you'd have to edit cwise_op_select.cc and cwise_op_gpu_select.cu.cc to implement the new feature, and then probably cwise_ops_test.py to validate the change.
body_text: You'd have to implement the change in math_ops.py _SelectShape to allow the new shape signature, math_ops.cc's ShapeFn to do the same, and then you'd have to edit cwise_op_select.cc and cwise_op_gpu_select.cu.cc to implement the new feature, and then probably cwise_ops_test.py to validate the change.
body: You'd have to implement the change in math_ops.py _SelectShape to allow the new shape signature, math_ops.cc's ShapeFn to do the same, and then you'd have to edit cwise_op_select.cc and cwise_op_gpu_select.cu.cc to implement the new feature, and then probably cwise_ops_test.py to validate the change.
